client.map

Class MapControllerState

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.map.MapControllerState
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MapInactiveState, MapPlayingState, MapSetupState

    public class MapControllerState
extends java.lang.Object
    The MapControllerState contains the state of the MapController. Depending on the state most methods behave differently.
    Version:
    1.0 Build Feb, 2016.
    Author:
    Christian Riboldi, Clayton Condie, Jacob Brewer, Joshua Powers, Joshua Van Steeter
